1111010110010011 1010001111000100 1 -> sum: 1001100101011000, cout: 1
0100010000111011 0010001001001010 0 -> sum: 0110011010000101, cout: 0
0110010101110011 0100001100000111 1 -> sum: 1010100001111011, cout: 0
1000111001000111 1010100100100100 1 -> sum: 0011011101101100, cout: 1
0010001001100010 1100111010001110 0 -> sum: 1111000011110000, cout: 0
1110101000111100 0100100100110100 1 -> sum: 0011001101110001, cout: 1
0000000000000000 0000000000000000 0 -> sum: 0000000000000000, cout: 0
1111111111111111 1111111111111111 1 -> sum: 1111111111111111, cout: 1
0000000000000000 1111111111111111 0 -> sum: 1111111111111111, cout: 0
